title: Melos (island)
description: Melos is a volcanic island in the Cyclades and in prehistoric times served as an important source of obsidian in the Aegean Sea. Substantial remains of Bronze Age and Greco-Roman civilizations have been excavated on the island.

properties.description: Coordinates after BAtlas; verified in Google Earth 2013 with reference to Wikipedia.
properties.title: Imagery location of Melos Ins.
